1 Activate a Member
To Activate a User, read this document:
[How to Activate a User>http://docs.google.com/a/curriki.org/Doc?docid=dgtsr6rh_46d3msz6&hl=en]
------------------------------------------------------ 1 Delete a Member
*NOTE:* Deleting a user is always a last, undesired, recourse. It is much better to just deactivate them (change password, remove display names and other information, set email address to something like "deleted+username@curriki.org", made inactive and email undeliverable).
How to delete a user out of the Curriki.org database. These steps assume that there are no resources associated with the user. If there are, delete the resources using the standard Curriki member interface.
Delete the user out of any groups.
Step 1 - Login as a Curriki Admin
Step 2 - Open the following page, where you replace "loginname" with the login name of the user you want to delete.
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/delete/Coll_loginname/WebPreferences
--Step 3 - Select Delete from the Admin toolbar.--
Step 4 - Select Yes to delete.
Step 5 Repeat for the following pages:
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/delete/Coll_loginname/WebHome
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/delete/XWiki/loginname
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/delete/Blog_loginname/WebHome
http://www.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/delete/Blog_loginname/WebPreferences
